Sentencas: After long-term running of solid oxide fuel cell system, the performance degradation of solid oxide fuel cell stack is caused by the fault of gas supply equipment.
Titulo: Fault detection and assessment for solid oxide fuel cell system gas supply unit based on novel principal component analysis

Sentencas: The more serious problem is that the stack performance does not match external load requirement.
Titulo: Fault detection and assessment for solid oxide fuel cell system gas supply unit based on novel principal component analysis

Sentencas: In order to guarantee the normal discharge of the stack, the fault detection of the system balance of plant components is a prerequisite for maintaining stack normal state, and is an important guarantee for increasing its operating cycle and remain useful lifetime.
Titulo: Fault detection and assessment for solid oxide fuel cell system gas supply unit based on novel principal component analysis

Sentencas: This paper proposes a novel statistical method based on principal component analysis and exponentially weighted moving average control chart for solid oxide fuel cell system gas supply fault detection.
Titulo: Fault detection and assessment for solid oxide fuel cell system gas supply unit based on novel principal component analysis

Sentencas: The gas supply fault is derived from the reformer and heat exchangers of the real system.
Titulo: Fault detection and assessment for solid oxide fuel cell system gas supply unit based on novel principal component analysis

Sentencas: The fault detection is carried out with collected data of real system and novel detection method.
Titulo: Fault detection and assessment for solid oxide fuel cell system gas supply unit based on novel principal component analysis

Sentencas: The results show that the novel method has higher efficiency and better effect than the traditional method under the system gas supply fault.
Titulo: Fault detection and assessment for solid oxide fuel cell system gas supply unit based on novel principal component analysis

Sentencas: Multi-times experimental data of real system is used to verify the robustness of the novel methods on-site fault detection.
Titulo: Fault detection and assessment for solid oxide fuel cell system gas supply unit based on novel principal component analysis
